About the product

Goat Milk Shampoo:

Get the perfect hair flip moments with our new improved Goat milk shampoo. This natural formula offers rich creamy lather with ultra-moisturizing goat milk. Clinically proven pea protein helps reducing frizz and fly-away hair, retains long-lasting moisturisation to the entire hair shaft. Jasmine purifies and adds exquisite shine for healthy, lustrous locks. Suitable for all hair types(Straight, Wavy or Curly) Great for dry, damaged and frizzy hair

Moisturising Bodywash:

A moisturizing treat for skin that needs lots of love. Enriched with Virgin Coconut oil and Acai Oil to relenish lost oil and moisture of skin. This body wash awakens sensations with dovy satiny aromas while leaves skin feeling soft and hydrated. Suitable for: All skin types. Great for Dry and Sensitive skin.

Honeyfix Facewash:

Cleanse your face with this oil-free formulation made with a whopping 8% of honey, a natural source of glycolic acid. Enriched with power-packed extracts from blackberry, papaya, gotukola and orange peel, this cleanser has gentle exfoliating, pore-shrinking and complexion brightening properties. Works on your acne like magic. No sulphates, No parabens, No silicones, No harsh chemicals. Suitable for : Normal to oily skin and acne prone skin

Aloevera Gel (hair and face):

Our Organic Aloe vera Gel is made using the pure pressed aloe vera gel using cold stabilisation method which leads to premium aloe vera gel and the quality is unmatchable with the patented method of manufacturing by sealing the nutrients intact. The multi-purpose aloe vera gel carries a multitude of benefits as a skin moisturiser, prevents acne, softens hair and promotes glowing skin.

Cold Pressed Almond Oil:

We all know the goodness of sweet almonds. It's considered a nutrient for the brain, nervous system, and id enriched in Vitamin A, B1, B2, B6, and E. So we extracted almond oil by cold-pressed method from sweet almonds to retain them intact. And is the most versatile oil used for both skincare and haircare.
